name: Bullets (Micrikacik)
description:
Game was made for 20 second game jam.

All controlls are mentioned in the game.

After learning main game mechanics, do not be scared to explore the map.

Game is a little bit unfinished, like there in no cool moving background and some visual and sound things do not fit. Nevertheless, in the current state it is as playable as it could be. So, have fun!
